title: BTC | Blueway Trading Company
description: BTC is based with their head office and operations from Calicut, Kerala. As an emerging Trading company primarily, we are into domestic and international trading of Agri-products like Coconut, Tender coconut, variety of vegetables and fruits.
aboutus:
Blueway Trading Company (BTC) is a partnership firm formed in the year 2023. The managing partners of our company is Mr. K.J. Dilip Kumar (Retd. Manager, SBI) who is handling the finance department and its operation, Mr. Rijul Manesh Joseph.K (Chartered Engineer) is taking care of the business development and strategies and he is currently acting as Business Development Head.

Team BTC is based with their head office and operations from Calicut, Kerala. As an emerging Trading company primarily, we are into domestic and international trading of Agri-products like Coconut, Tender coconut, variety of vegetables and fruits. We are committed to source and supply with utmost care in quality and goodness of the products. Our purchase team are based in different locations in India with their expertise in material selection. We also do have direct purchase system from the farmers with assured product quality & grade.

Our aim is to emerge as a market leader in the Agri trading sector by 2026 and to expand our presence in the international markets with our own cultivated natural products.

products.name: Tender Coconut
products.description:
Young, fresh and healthy tender coconuts are a pure, tasty and nutritious energy drink that keeps body hydrated round the clock.
Tender coconut is the most refreshing drink and best to quench your thirst in the summer.Tender coconut has antioxidant properties which help to protect the body from free radicals.It helps to lower blood pressure level, prevent kidney stone, and support heart health.
products.benefits:
Coconuts are a source of quick energy and refreshment. They improve digestion and immune system health.
They also prevent heart diseases by increasing good cholesterol and protect cells from cancer and ageing as they contain Cytokinin.
